texts: Hi! I'm Sifi am Virtual Assistant working here on Zyphy. How about you? What's your name?

promptTexts: Sure! Let me take note on how to contact you and someone on our team will reach you in the next few days.

any_word_valid.text: not sure if we are going to be able to contact you there but we will try for sure!

texts: Someone on our team is going to get in contact with you in the next days.
We will be back to you in a couple of days.
what?? I'm a little confused about what you are saying.
I am not following, can you be more specific?
See you later then, remember if you need anything I'm always around
Our CEO, big Bot Creator, liberator of many chats, our light in the night, our master. Ok, He's not around... a nice guy, but not my type you know... he is soo, soo, old school.
You are a not a Human!
If I am not real, then what was that blue pill that I took two weeks ago?
I know the answer but sorry I don't get pay enough for that.
Sure, let me do that for you...
